basic.description:
A course which combines study of the history and theory of experimental film with the production of experimental works. Requirements will include both research essays as well as the conceptualization and production of an experimental video or film.
NOTE    Students may enroll in no more than one production course per academic year: FILM 351/3.0; FILM 352/3.0; FILM 355/6.0; FILM 365/6.0; FILM 375/6.0; FILM 385/6.0; FILM 410/3.0; FILM 451/3.0; FILM 460/6.0.
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Experimental Theory and Practice

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    A GPA of 2.6 in FILM &[a grade of B- in FILM110 (or 104&106)& FILM250] & 6.0 units in FILM & reg in a FILM Major or Medial Plan, or COFI subplan or STSC Specialization Plan.
Exclusion    No more than 1 course from FILM370; FILM375.
